cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CE. 

The paper deals with a problem in machine learning and optimization, specifically in the area of multi-armed bandits and contextual bandits. The paper discusses similarity information and its use in contextual bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper is likely to be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) as these sub-categories are relevant to the topic of the paper.
